name: Garai - Old School Adventure Platformer Demo
name_original: Garai - Old School Adventure Platformer Demo
description:
It's a very short demo (5 minutes expected completion time, 2 minutes completion in creators time), please give it a try. PLEASE GIVE FEEDBACK, ALL feedback appreciated.

 I'm looking for some inspiration (by getting word back here that someone completed my short demo) to continue my game. 

Absolutely everything is 100% original - from sprites, backgrounds, S.E., music. These have also already been completed - just putting the game together now which is taking longer than I expected.
